sentences.sContent: A single tree gave shade from the sun.
They won the game by a single point.
sentences.sCn: 他们仅以一分的优势赢得比赛。

sentences.sContent: the highest price ever paid for a single work of art
sentences.sCn: 为单件艺术品所支付的最高价格

sentences.sContent: ...They suggest this indicates that dogs aren't sensing emotions from a single feature...
...save for a single word added in the margin of the final page : Flawless...
...You should decide on the best choice and mark the corresponding letter on Answer Sheet 2 with a single line through the centre...
...on the best choice and mark the corresponding batter on Answer Sheet 2 with a single line through the centre...
...More than 20% overspent their income by more than $100 every single month...
...Please mark the corresponding letter for each item on Answer Sheet 2 with a single line through the centre...

phrases.pCn: 单一市场（尤其指免关税的欧洲市场）；统一市场

words.tran: 逐一地；个别地；各自地；直截了当地
使显著；使单一化；使成为唯一；使成为单数

trans.tranOther: a ticket for a trip from one place to another but not back again
